courses.title: Introduction to UX Design
courses.description: Learn the basics of UX design, including user research, wireframing, and prototyping.

courses.title: UI Design for Beginners
courses.description: A beginner-friendly course on UI design, covering fundamental principles and tools.

courses.title: Advanced UX Strategies
courses.description: Dive deeper into UX design with advanced techniques for creating user-centered designs.

courses.title: Design Thinking for UI/UX
courses.description: Explore the design thinking process and how it applies to creating effective UI/UX.

courses.title: Wireframing Essentials
courses.description: Learn how to create effective wireframes to plan your user interfaces.

courses.title: Prototyping with Figma
courses.description: Master the art of prototyping using Figma, one of the leading design tools.

courses.title: UX Research Methods
courses.description: Understand various UX research methods to gather insights about your users.

courses.title: Visual Design for UI/UX
courses.description: Enhance your UI/UX designs with strong visual design principles.

courses.title: Mobile App Design
courses.description: Learn how to design user-friendly mobile apps that meet modern usability standards.

courses.title: Usability Testing in UX
courses.description: A comprehensive guide to conducting usability tests to improve your designs.
